Title: Last Dance
Plot: After Dana's family treats the girls coldly, Alice is determined to arrange a special event to commemorate their friend. While Helena's lawsuit is resolved with a surprising outcome, Bette is willing to fight for Angelica's custody. Max lands a job, giving Jenny something to write about. Dealing with her grief, Shane is willing to make the ultimate commitment to Carmen. Finally, Lara arrives from Paris and is comforted by Alice.
GuestStars: Aaron Craven,  Caleb Rogers,  Landy Cannon,  Andrew Francis,  Susan Hogan,  Michael Hogan,  Alexandra Hedison,  Steven Eckholdt
